description: Search and retrieve company logos by brand or domain. Customize size, format, and theme to match your design needs. Accelerate design, prototyping, and content workflows with reliable direct logo URLs.

apiKey.description: Your Logo.dev API key. Get one at https://logo.dev

capabilities.name: search_logos
capabilities.description: Search for company logos by brand name or company name. Returns a list of matching companies with their domains and logo URLs.

capabilities.name: get_logo_url
capabilities.description: Get a direct logo image URL for a specific domain. Supports customization options like size, format, theme, and more.
